ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] caseId with data type Id
A unique identifier that the payer or information source can use to identify the person as a Policy Holder.
Contains zero or more [0..*] diagnosisList, where its type is Diagnosis List Entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
Contains zero or more [0..*] priorAuthorization, where its type is Prior Authorization
Contains exactly one [1..1] isResidentOfCmsQualifiedFacility with data type Boolean
Contains zero or more [0..*] clinicalInformation, where its type is Clinical Information
